name: Crater Critters
description:
Game created as part of Ludum Dare 46 in less than 48 hours

(Ludum Dare version does not contain music as it was not created by me)

Crater Critters is a game where you play as a sentient tree and protect a group of strange critters that are trapped in a crater. Use their faith to get enough power in order to set them free.

Controls:
Right mouse button - hold and drag to move the camera
Left mouse button - click on abilites to select them, then click on the ground to cast it
F1 - toggle fullscreen
F2 - toggle sound effects
F3 - toggle music

Credits: 

All programming, art and sound effects where created by me

Additional credits:

music source: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/262259/

font source: https://www.dafont.com/tomodachy.font
